entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
